definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: This is a common strategy among pros who have a lot of experience and iron discipline.
sentences.chinese: 这是有经验，有铁的纪律的专业人士常用的策略。

sentences.english: Slice like a pro without risking a cut.
sentences.chinese: 像专业人士那样切片也不用担心割伤。

sentences.english: As a professional, your position will not be entitled for overtime payment.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个专业人士，你的岗位不会获得任何加班补贴。

sentences.english: Even groups of professionals are living in shared houses with no lounge, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 很多专业人士也合住没有起居室的房子。

sentences.english: The answer is, it depends, and you should consult a tax professional.
sentences.chinese: 看情况而定，你应该咨询税务专业人士。

sentences.english: After all, without the customer, there is no professional.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，没有顾客，就没有专业人士。

sentences.english: Estimators are mostly professional personages, which ignores ordinary public's participation.
sentences.chinese: 评价者多是专业人士，忽视了普通公众的参与。

sentences.english: Professionals are humble and generous in their praise of others.
sentences.chinese: 专业人士在赞美它人时应是谦逊和慷慨的。

sentences.english: U. S. -trained professionals discovering opportunities galore in the Far East.
sentences.chinese: 美国培养出来的专业人士们发现远东机会大好。

sentences.english: Most conferences really only speak to a small percentage of the profession.
sentences.chinese: 大多数会议只关注专业人士中的很小的一部分。

sentences.english: They are, however, unerringly perceptive of trusting relationships with professionals.
sentences.chinese: 但他们却是，准确无误地知觉与专业人士的信任关系。
无论是忙碌的家庭主妇还是专业人士。

sentences.english: The pros sell short, giving that stock a bit of a push.
sentences.chinese: 专业人士开始做空，往下推动股票。

sentences.english: Jia men and women are rich businesspeople and professionals.
sentences.chinese: 甲等男女属于富商以及专业人士。

sentences.english: Beginners like to brag, experts like to listen.
sentences.chinese: 新手喜欢吹牛，专业人士喜欢细听。

sentences.english: No one likes to wait for un-returned phone calls or emails.
sentences.chinese: 没有哪个专业人士喜欢等未回的电话或邮件。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
proletariat/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4] plus masses/also written 無產階級|无产阶级[wu2 chan3 jie1 ji2] in PRC Marxist theory
